title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout view and deleting the original image file from the outline image, renaming another image as the same name as the original image doesn't update the displayed image.
OB: The original image is still displayed after importing a new image with the same name and deleting the original image file.
EB: The new image should be displayed after importing it with the same name and deleting the original image file.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Observe the displayed image in the layout view.
